title: Learn Javascript by 7 Games
content: One of the best ways to learn JavaScript is to create projects. One of the best and funnest ways is to create games.

title: JavaScript Uppercase
content: How to Capitalize a String in JS with .toUpperCase. To use the .toUpperCase() method, assign the string you want to change to uppercase to a variable and then prepend it with .toUpperCase().

title: parseInt() in JavaScript â€“ JS String to Int Example
content: The main purpose of using the parseInt function is to extract a number from a string. This turns the returned value to an actual number.
